cheatsheet.title: Create a connection to local installation of JasperReport Server

description.b: In this cheatsheet will be shown how to create a connection to a local installation of JasperReport Server. This new connection can be used then to upload the local reports into the server.

item.title: Switch to repository explorer
item.description: From JasperSoft Studio go into the repository explorer.

item.title: Start the wizard
item.description: Right click on the node "Servers" and select "Create a JasperServer connection".
